name: test_e2e_with_logs[088_SQLI_UNION_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_001` |
| **Name** | Basic UNION SELECT with NULL |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `UNION SELECT NULL`
- **Encoded**: `UNION%20SELECT%20NULL`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~50000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:26:02.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_UNION_001-1769351162692-0c5jcj pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_001 uri=/?q=UNION%20SELECT%20NULL client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
